Extract a subject-specific class list from Wonde API data

Source: R/class_list.R
extract_class_list.Rd

Extract a subject-specific class list from Wonde API data

Usage

extract_class_list(
  WondeData,
  schools,
  maths_names,
  maths_desc_names,
  year_pattern,
  verbose = TRUE
)

Arguments

WondeData

List of school-level data as returned by get_secondary_school_student_data().

schools

Data frame of school metadata containing at least id, name, and urn.

maths_names

Character vector of subject names to match (used when GetMathBySubject = TRUE).

maths_desc_names

Character vector of text fragments to match in class descriptions (used when GetMathByClassDescription = TRUE).

year_pattern

Character or numeric pattern used to match student year codes (e.g., `"7"` for Year 7 or `"8"` for Year 8).

verbose

Logical; if TRUE, prints progress.

Value

A data frame combining all matched student, class, and teacher information across schools, or NULL if no valid data are found.

Examples

if (FALSE) {
class_list_df <- extract_class_list(
  WondeData = WondeData,
  schools = schools,
  secondary = secondary,
  maths_names = c("Mathematics", "Maths"),
  maths_desc_names = c("MATH", "NUMERACY"),
  year_pattern = "7"
)
}
